name: A Sailing Boat on a Wide Expanse of Water
description: A Sailing Boat on a Wide Expanse of Water; Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn (Dutch, 1606 - 1669); about 1650; Pen and brown ink and brown wash, on tinted paper; 8.9 x 18.3 cm (3 1/2 x 7 3/16 in.); 85.GA.94; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: A Sailing Boat on a Wide Expanse of Water
medium: Pen and brown ink and brown wash, on tinted paper
